summary: This appears to be an email transmitting an ex parte submission or memorandum in the criminal case United States v. Jeffrey Epstein (19 Cr. 490) to the court. The attached memo likely contains legal arguments or requests submitted by one party without the other party's presence.

keyFacts: An ex parte legal submission was made in the case United States v. Jeffrey Epstein on August 5, 2019.
The document is an email transmitting an attached PDF memorandum related to the case.
